content.detailedDescription: My girlfriend, crystal selim was on her lunch break and looked towards the north when she noticed a flock of birds. as she watched the birds she looked above and noticed, high in the sketch above. she had her phone out cause she was going to message me and took these photos, the zoom on high and got about 10 pics. it was flying from north to south above her at a high rate of speed, only about 20 seconds in duration. the blue is being illuminated from the front of the craft. several pics from the front, bottom and rear. please help me figure out what this is. i have pictures but cannot download to this.
content.summary: Flew over head at high rate of speed and high elevation. made no sound and was observed for about  20 seconds. blue lights illuminated from the front of the vehicle.

content.detailedDescription:
At 10pm i was out front of my apartment getting ready for the moon to peak above the mountains that are to the ene of my location so i could photograph the super moon, blood moon, and total eclipse that was all taking place. i set up my camera as the moon was coming from very the mountain. as i was taking photos and looking at them i saw something strange in one of them. there was something that was captured in the photo that has some light to it and it appeared to move in one direction then chance direction and head back from where it came from. not sure what it is at all. it was only on the one photo. i know there were aircraft in the area but to me it doesn't look like anything an aircraft would so. i think it could be a ufo. i have heard before that there has been one seen in the area earlier in the year but i don't remember who said it. i never did see the object with my own eyes. just in the photo my camera took. the settings i used on my nikon d7000 with a 70-300mm lens were:
f-stop f/5.6
exposure time 1sec
iso speed iso-6400
exposure bias 0 step
focal length 300mm
max aperture 5
metering mode pattern
no flash
35mm focal length 450
content.summary: Was taking photos of the super moon eclipse while looking at the photos noticed something strange in the photo

content.detailedDescription: I was on a trip coming home from saskatchewan and i saw a blimp like object.Looked like it was scanning the railway.At first i thought it was an air ballon or a blimp but it was not moving it just sat there.I was interested in the strange object i think it was scanning the railway.We had to continue on are way home.If you dont believe my story then you are no different then me you dont believe it untill you see it.
content.summary: Looked like it was scanning the railroad system

content.detailedDescription: Single light in the sky seemed to be hovering we saw this through our living room window. we thought it was a helicopter by the way it was. it came towards us slowly as it got closer looked like two white lights at the end and a flashing red light in the middle. it then turned away from us and went left moved away slowly over the orison. appeared low but what mad it weird was there was no sound from it at all.
content.flightPath: Hovering then path,Path with directional change
content.summary: Two solid white lights at ends red flashing light in middle,low in the sky,moving slowly,absolutley no sound.

content.detailedDescription: My children took videos and photos with their own cell phones of an ufo sighted during the recent lunar eclipse on 27th of september. several videos and photos were taken at two different locations 8 miles apart. apparently, they were other witnesses for an schoolmate of my son sent him a similar photo taken at a different location. the strange thing is that we could not see the ufo with the naked eye but through the cell phone cameras.
content.summary: Ufo sighted during recent lunar eclipse

content.detailedDescription:
Lookjing for moon after blood moon the evening before.  looking towards the se when i noticed a light moving through the trees, airborne, coming from the west or coast, towards the east or mountains.  
as the light broke into clear sky, it appeared to be a small aircfart with it wing engulfed in flames.  immeidiately notice there was zero sound!
ran in and grabbed my tablet (surface pro3) and took video and several photos.  
noticed at the same time, the increased noise of a jets engines and turned to the northeast to see a small private jet veering sharpely to the right and turn its landing lighjts on.
living here for 35 years, i see private coimmerciaand military aircraft every day and night.  even the new osprey in all of its engine configurations, even while transforming.
this was none of them to vbe sure!
thge craft continud on its way and i assumed it was on fire looking to try and set down on the i-8 freeway, to the west of alpine!!
continued to watch for about 1 1/2 minutes while taking the video and photos!
i have contacted nbc, a tom j. there had me send him the video and photos but he was unableto find anyone else who had seen the event or whatever it was!
i contacted mufon iun san diego this morning and they recommended i post it here for the record.
for the record, i am 65, ex-military, trained observer, and sepnd lots of time outside, looking up at the night sky as a form of relaxation.  i constantly see things moving around at night that i cannot identify, but assume they are so high and hard to see, they must be satellites we put there.
this is the second ufo, that has perplexed me...The other i was ordered to sign a non-dosclosure over, since i was in the military at the time!
content.summary: Appeared to be wing like structure on fire...Yellow/orange flames, no smoke or noise at all

content.detailedDescription: We were outside not far from the house. observing the outside area felt great. my mom first noticed the pulsating orb coming over the house at 15-20degree from horizon. it seemed to be about 75-100 feet up. i correlated the distance to a memory i had when bungee jumping. i thought at first it might have been a lantern. i felt the wind in my face (sw) the notice the object moving against it. it pulsated and the lights it generated where in a spectrum different then fire or burning lantern. almost 16bit video game like. it went at steady pace. my hairs stood on end as i realized it was what it was. i felt at peace and scared almost. but i noticed more peace. like it was a good thing. it eventually disappeared over the horizon heading south east. i took a video. [link moved to fi section/cms/tg]
content.summary: Mom noticed object first flying over head. looked as if video game 16 bit illiumination. came from ne and continued se direction against wind, pulsating. all hiars stood up.

content.detailedDescription: I was headed from work in kanata headed south bound to the queensway (417) on terry fox road. i was just outside of march estates on terry fox road when something caught my eye in the southern hemisphere moving at incredible speeds flashed/moved beyond speeds comprehending to physics took place in the atmosphere above southern ottawa/kanata. it traveled from west to east at first, made a incomprehensible turn at alarming speeds to a trajectory out of earth's atmosphere while headed south. a trail of light was seen as it sped off and i'm assuming into space and time. the craft upon the change of direction for a mere moment looked to be of the cigar shaped craft. this is real, i have no doubt in my mind. i would swear under oath!
content.summary: Unreal speed, unreal maneuvering, flash trail of trajectory

content.detailedDescription:
I was in the big horn mountains at black mountain range by taylors mine facing west taking a photo of a sunset. didn't see this while there taking the photo which i had taken several photos up there, once i got home several days later noticed this green glowing orb in one of my photos, and i can't explain it.I can't say it done anything because i did not see that there while taking photo so it apparently only shows up in the photo i took, did not observe any thing at the time of photo.
i feel this is really odd cause something like this should have or would have been noticeable at the time of photo, but i did not see anything... i was elk hunting at the time so i was very aware of my surroundings and was watching the ground frequently looking for elk tracks and trails, not sure how this wasn't observed at the time of photograph, but when i got home and was downloading my photos to computer i noticed this odd globe and then started asking the guys that were elk hunting with me what this could be after we all got home and no one can explain the object in the photo. i also had my german shepherd dog with and he didn't appear to have noticed anything like that at the time either.
a few days before that me and 2 other gentlemen noticed a flying disc around 30,000 feet in the sky, we looked through binoculars and observed this flying silver disc when taking pictures of this object with iphone it just appears as a white dot against the clear blue sky, we had also noticed at least 6 us aircraft bombers in that vicinity during the sighting of this silver object, we all concluded that it wasn't a weather ballon but perhaps some sort of saucer drone perhaps. that was the only conclusion we could come up with, other than a flying saucer.
the green orb wasn't observed at the time of photograph again i only noticed the green orb after we returned home from a 15 day hunt, we came home on september, 27, 2015 around 21:30
the last 3 photos are of the saucer like object 3 of us witnessed a few days before i seen the green globe at taylor's mine
content.summary: Found this green glowing orb in a photograph i took.

content.detailedDescription: I was stood at my backdoor having a cigarette before leaving for work and was looking at the moon. i noticed what i though at first were two aircraft flying in the same direction almost side by side and i thought that they were very close to each other in airspace and that there was no way that air traffic control would let two aircraft fly on the same path at the same altitude, this now had my full attention as i thought that i was about to witness a mid air crash. however, as i was watching them i noticed that the furthest was actually an aircraft had a vapour trail and the one that was closer to me had no vapour trail and no wings that i could see. it was the same size in length and height as the aircraft and even had the same reflective white colour. the sun was rising behind me and was lighting them up it must have been at the same altitude as the aircraft and as i was watching the object it was sort of jumping slightly ahead of the aircraft but still at the side, it was getting closer and closer and then it did a direct right turn and went above the aircraft. it took a few seconds for it to sink in what i had just seen and first i was unsure, but then quite excited. unfortunately, the low clouds then obscured my view and i do not know what happened. i was disappointed that i didn't get to see what happened then and where the object went to. this morning i even looked out again at the same time and saw the aircraft on its own on the same flight path and nothing else was around in the sky, which made my sighting even more mysterious and exciting. there was not enough time to get my phone to film this, i would have missed the whole thing.
content.summary: Saw an object flying side by side with aircraft, then it did a sharp right turn above the plane

content.detailedDescription: Was outside smoking looked at the moon and right above my neighbors trees coming from the east heading southwest was this b ubble type thing longer i watched it turned solid pearl white changed shape moved like a bubble but then looked triangle. this was not the first time i have seen this. never moving east to west. i have to keep rubbing my eyes looking away and back at it to make sure it is there. i have tried several times to get a picture and this was the only time anything has shown up. it will be close and then in the blink of an eye back to bubble shape floating much further. sorry quick half ass description. i read something about orbs in colorado and just wanted to share this. the couple friends i have shown say its a glare but it is absolutly not. iv never seen anything beable to move change like this. it was incredible. and very pretty. its very hard to see i do know but its straight up from the moon. the 30 seconds around trying to get it in focus it all thed sudden was the shape of a triangle.
content.flightPath: Path with directional change,Path then hovering
content.summary: Bubble like changes colors from pearl white to translucent moving east to west

content.detailedDescription:
Coming home on motorcycle on my road at 8:30, i looked up and saw two flashing lights right in front of me, then above. at first i thought it was the tower in the next town, but then i said, no those are red and you can't see them from here. i quickly pulled over and lifted mt helmet and noticed they were heading towards route 12, no sound and no outline that i could see.
i then resumed my ride and after a minute turned back to try and follow it, drove pretty fast and went to an open area by the highway and lost sight of it.
whole event was around 10 to 15 minutes.
i wish i had taken my phone out for a shot but night shots are always bad and being on a bike in 55 degree weather it was buried in my jacket.
content.summary: Two reddish lights flashing slowly, no sound. moving around 30 mph

content.detailedDescription: I was outside making sure our chickens were all in the henhouse for the night and when i headed for the house my eyes caught sight of this glowing object fairly low in the sky to the north. it was different than the one i reported in july but it was obviously another visit to observe goings on at a factory that has assembled drones for the military the last two years. activity in the area has been increasing of late and i believe this plant is the only reason for this to happen as drones can be utilized as a delivery system for nuclear weapons. i immediately went to get the camera and photograph it but as i was changing it to video mode it disappeared. but when it did i noted that there was an almost imperceptible blur from it's exit towards the east although most observers would have thought that it disappeared. i have been watching the sky off and on since the sighting i reported from july 31st of this year and was waiting for another occurrence i couldn't de-bunk. i should mention that the object was hovering approximately two miles away from the drone plant. i feel it helps substantiate my reasoning for the activity. also, one of my tenant's father was watching the same object at the same time from mcminnville. i urged him to file a report also and he was going to he said. please look for it as our reports will validate each other as you know.
content.summary: I was outside closing the henhouse when i noticed the object to our north. attempted to photograph it but it vanished before i could.

content.detailedDescription: I was a passenger in a car traveling west on i-10 in katy.  it was around 8 pm and i was looking out the window.  i saw an orange/amber light that was too large and bright to be a satellite or star and was not moving at all. it was too high to be a street light. i thought it may be a helicopter hovering but it didn't have the normal lights.  i looked around and saw there were other amber lights like it in a grid, maybe 15 or 20 lights. that was very startling to see.  the lights were evenly placed over south katy between fry road and grand parkway.  the lights were slowly fading in and out, but not in unison, they were not moving.  we pulled over in a parking lot on the north side of katy at westgreen blvd. to get a better look and there was no noticeable noise or heat coming from the lights. after a few minutes they started to slowly move together and seemed to connect.  the lights completely disappeared and a large grey triangle traveled slowly and quietly east/south east towards the city of houston. it was difficult to see the craft because there were no lights on it. it was about 200 feet above the treeline  it was a very large, equilateral triangle that covered most of the area between south fry road and south mason road.  both of us had the very distinct feeling that whatever was in there knew we were observing it so we decided not to follow it.  it was gone from view in 2 minutes, maybe less at that point.
content.summary: Noticed an orange light in sky, then noticed several, flashing, then they merged into a triangle and faded out.

content.detailedDescription:
1.I was in p.E. class, playing in our school field along with class mates around mid day of john adams elementary school. 

2. the two f-15 fighter jets is what i first saw. 

3. at first i thought it was a jet as well but saw it had no resemblance to anything i've ever seen in the air. 

4.The ufo was silver and shined bright i assume by the reflection of the sky light, it flew in the middle and slightly in front of the two f-15's, the three flew straight from ne to nw, above all the trees behind the school. you could only hear the sound of the two jets as they left sight.

5.Startled and very confused, i can't remember if i asked any of my fellow classmates if they saw it, i know no one asked me, went on doing what i was doing after they were gone.

6.They flew past the trees out of sight. felt it was less than a minute.
content.summary: What seemed like a high speed chase

content.detailedDescription:
I reside in sydney australia. on a recent holiday to sri lanka, i had the opportunity to visit one of the most intriguing buddhist monuments in sri lanka  - a buddhist stupa located in the middle of a remote wild life sanctuary. the stupa is known as the somawathi stupa and lately it has been drawing huge crowds because of various mysterious phenomena being reported at the stupa such as strange lights or rays of lights emanating from this stupa, mysterious sounds of drums and bells being heard from within the stupa, and even eye witness accounts of other dimensional beings frequenting the place. 

the somawathi temple authorities have put out a large number of photos showing a number of anomalous events. one document that they have published (see attachment) clearly shows photos of what looks like a flying saucer hovering above the stupa. the same document also shows what looks like an extraterrestrial being showing up in a number of photos.  the being that appears in these photos is about 1.5 feet in height with a large head and a spindly body. it looks grey or greyish brown.  the being seems to have three pairs of limbs (two arms, two legs and somewhere from its midsection it appears to have another pair of small arms/appendages) in some photos the being is fully visible while in some others it appears to be only partially visible. it is amazing how clearly visible the being is, in some photos!

i have attached here a scanned copy of the document published by the temple authorities showing all the photos i have described above.  the sinhalese text on the document can be translated as follows. the heading reads:

“the visitation of extraterrestrial beings on 14th february 2014 at 7.00pm, in what looks like a flying saucer, to somawathi stupa which contains lord buddha’s right tooth relic,”

the paragraph at the bottom right hand corner reads:

“photos taken by: resident monk of somawathi vihara, venerbale medhananda, parliament minster jayawickrama perera, and rsident of kadwatha, r. p. gamini ratnakumara.”

“contact cheif monk of somawathi viharaya in sungawila, venerable pahamune, sri sumangla, who is a retired lecturer and former section head at the university of peradeniya, and secretary of the malwathu oya chapter on, phone numbers 0273279285, 071- 8086040”

my first reaction to the photos was that “are these photos photo- shopped?” however, the temple authorities have openly published the names of the people who have taken these photos as well as a contact number to get in touch with the chief monk for any queries about the photos. i guess an analysis of the original photos could reveal if they are photo-shopped or not. in addition to the anomalous photos, there are eyewitness accounts of actual sightings of strange phenomena. so my gut feeling is that there might be some basis to these reports.  i had a firsthand experience myself, on the night i stayed overnight in a facility not far from the stupa, which might be worth mentioning. i went up to the roof top to enjoy the cool night air. it was a very clear night and when i looked up at the sky in the direction of the orion’s constellation, there was a blinking light in the sky. it blinked about every 12 seconds and at times seemed to be hovering in one spot while at times it moved in a very irregular manner.  this was visible for about 20 minutes, then it completely disappeared. myself and two other people witnessed this.

i would like to pass on this information and the scanned photos in case it might spark your interest, and mufon wishes to investigate further.
content.summary: Ufo and extra-terrestrial sightings at a buddhist stupa

content.detailedDescription: Taking pictures of the eclipse, turned around and saw this opposite (w).
content.summary: V shaped cloud

content.detailedDescription: I was on my way home from work heading down interstate 85 southbound in gastonia, as i passed exit 20 i noticed a bright white orb that seemed to be spinning and flipling around changing shapes. at first i thought it was the moon with clouds blowing over it making it appear distorted. however there was no light reflecting in the clouds around it as what happens when the moon is partly covered in clouds. once i saw the shape change i knew it was not the moon. i got excited at this point. i continued down i85 south until i got to bessemer city and exited towards my house. at the top of the ramp i snapped my first picture which was of a blurry, glowing orb with absolutely no light around it!!! i got this feeling as if i should stop on the road by my house to try to see it. (almost like i was being told to!) so from the time i got off the interstate until i got to my street i only caught a couple of glimpses of it. it seemed to be continuing above i85 south. once i got to the next street over from my house i stopped and sure enough i saw it again and was amazed. this thing was glowing like an orb one second, the next the light seemed to take more of the classic saucer shape. once i stopped i could faintly see a red light flashing in sequence on it. this is when i grabbed my phone and took a couple of quick videos(my memory is almost full so i didn't want to take a long video then risk loosing it if i ran out of memory) once i got my camera on it and zoomed in i noticed not only the red dot flashing but a faint green one as well. this thing was way up there too, i had to zoom all the way in to get these videos so i would estimate it to be in the 10's of thousands of feet up in the sky. right as i stopped recording on one of the videos it accelerated and dissappeared briefly, only to reappear a few seconds later as the glowing orb again. this time i zoomed in and took several pictures, and in each one the shape is somewhat different. it is a semicircle in one, then and orb, then like a pie with a few pieces missing. i stayed with it until i lost it over the tree tops as it appeared to continue above i85 southbound.
content.summary: Glowing white light that changed shapes emited red and green lights, followed i 85 southbound.

(almost like i was being told to!) so from the time i got off the interstate until i got to my street i only caught a couple of glimpses of it. it seemed to be continuing above i85 south. once i got to the next street over from my house i stopped and sure enough i saw it again and was amazed. this thing was glowing like an orb one second, the next the light seemed to take more of the classic saucer shape. once i stopped i could faintly see a red light flashing in sequence on it. this is when i grabbed my phone and took a couple of quick videos(my memory is almost full so i didn't want to take a long video then risk loosing it if i ran out of memory) once i got my camera on it and zoomed in i noticed not only the red dot flashing but a faint green one as well. this thing was way up there too, i had to zoom all the way in to get these videos so i would estimate it to be in the 10's of thousands of feet up in the sky. right as i stopped recording on one of the videos it accelerated and dissappeared briefly, only to reappear a few seconds later as the glowing orb again. this time i zoomed in and took several pictures, and in each one the shape is somewhat different. it is a semicircle in one, then and orb, then like a pie with a few pieces missing. i stayed with it until i lost it over the tree tops as it appeared to continue above i85 southbound.

content.detailedDescription: I was walking out of walgreens pharmacy at 8pm to my car which was parked south in the parking lot.  as i was walking toward car i saw two object with a very deep red color like a stop light size with same color fall downward in a second or so   they were side by side and there were tow falling to the ground at the same time  they were gone in a second and fell together.
content.summary: Size of red street stop light

content.detailedDescription:
Weds,sept 30 2015: this object was seen twice within 4 hours. 
it is assumed to be the size of a large helicopter to small plane with a yellow white strobe light. the first time it was seen was by my mother in the east by se sky as she was driving home around 8:30 pm. i observed this object outside my window to the sw around 11:15 pm. the object was barely clearing the tree line and flashed it's very bright yellow white light. it blinked once then flashed again 20-30 seconds later only a few feet away from where i had first seen the object it was moving very slow as it changed direction and went south. i can not stress enough that it was completely silent! it was flying so low that the flashing light lit up the ground and surrounding houses below! had it been a plane or helicopter it would've deafening and shaken our home! had it not been for the bright light i could've passed overhead completely unnoticed by anyone. i scoured the local news reports and weather. there was no report of a manhunt or the like. if you can uncover anything i hope you can tell me that i didn't see a ufo. i truly hope there is a rational explanation to whatever i just saw. please contact me via e-mail if needed.
content.summary: Strobing yellow-white light barely over tree line. no sound seen twice over 4hour time period.

content.detailedDescription: I wish to submit this picture my friend, who wishes to remain anonymous, too when he was having lunch in september of 2015 outside in new york city.  he looked up and saw a bright green glow to the right of the top of the freedom tower.  after wiping his eyes and shaking his head as he thought he was seeing a glare, he noticed the craft was still there and took a picture.  i'd like to see if mufon can analyze the picture to find out if its a craft used for time travel or inter planetary/dimensional travel.
content.summary: My friend who wishes to remain anonymous, was having lunch on an outdoor patio and noticed a green glowing object that resembeles a winged craft with only the body of the crsft and wings glowing bright green.

content.detailedDescription:
1. i walked the dogs outside along with my three year old daughter out in our back yard of our apt at 8:00 pm i causally look up to see the moon and stars but for some reason, i looked at a direction where i know the moon isn't located, just to see the stars and in that section & where there wasn't any stars a rare and awkward bling of light just captivated me it lasted what seemed less than 10 minutes this was the first time i seen a kind of pulsing flash/glow.

2.The way it glowed looked a way brightening than what the faint stars are besides the sky night is clear.

3. i was thinking it was a plane or helicopter.

4. it wasn't moving in any direction and it made rare slow type of pulsing blinks with white lights looking like a star from the distance a bit brighter as well, i know planes or helicopters do not make. after what was two or three slow flashes a object next (right side) to it what looked like a slash or a short white comet went down. after ten minutes another similar to a star (which i've been seeing for may years the seem way) traveling from the left side of where the primary blinking was  traveled in a straight like manner, like a "satellite" with no apparent flash or blinks (like planes do).  

5. thrilled and astonished, i hadn't seen this type of demonstration, i tried recording it with my phone but it seemed to dark on the screen so i called my wife to rush down so i can have a witness as soon as she came down it was gone. from 8:00 to 8:14 pm i was disappointed my wife couldn't see it kind of making me feel like i'm imagining things.

6.The object stopped blinking the comet light was less than a half a second short the straight traveling object wasn't much of my interest since i've seen that several times.
content.summary: A pulse style glow of white light, about 10 times then a short comet like line after what seemed lie a satellite or star light with no blinking traveling north.

content.detailedDescription: My husband was outside the apartment when he saw seven orbs out of the corner of his eye. they flew across the sky, somewhat slowly, all in unison. they appeared on the west horizon and vanished toward the east. he was able to snap a few photos before they disappeared.
content.summary: There were seven glowing orbs flying in unison from west to east. it lasted only  30-40 seconds

content.detailedDescription: Was sitting and saw an object in sky that did not move but was blinking a variety of colors. first i though it was an airplane but it did not move it just stood. there. object has been seen for a couple weeks after first sighting on sept 4 2015. on the first day i took pictures with a samsung galaxy note 5. on sept 5th when i spot it again, i took better pics with 8x zoom on pro mode.
content.summary: Object thats is blink red blue green and white

content.detailedDescription:
I was performing my duties as a security officer. i was parked on the southwest end of the property, when i turned to look towards the southeast end of the property. i looked up at the sun. the sun, which was unusually bright! i then turned to look to the right of the sun. 
there, behind some clouds, was some type of huge object that was almost as bright as the sun. 
i then proceeded to take some pictures with my iphone 6 plus.
i then continued to indirectly watch the sun and the unidentified object until the object disappeared. unfortunately, it disappeared on me when i took my eyes off from it to grab a bottle of water from my vehicle.
i then proceeded to look at the pictures that took, that's when i noticed a green oval shaped object, which appeared to come out of the other object that was behind the clouds. it slowly left in a southeast direction.
i wasn't able to visually see this moving green object with my eyes, nor with my phone's camera.
i was only able to see it after i viewed the pictures.
i was excited to see this going on in my presence!
it's not my first sighting of strange objects in the sky.
i'm also sending another picture that i took about three weeks ago.
there's an object in this picture as well that did not see when i first took the picture.
content.flightPath: Hovering then path,Path with directional change
content.summary: I noticed that the sun was unusually bright. to the right of the sun there was something very big and bright. a green oval shaped object came out of it.

content.detailedDescription: In the early morning hours of march 8 2012, i was periodically going outside to view the aurora borealis effects that were produced by a massive solar flare from the sun. the first few times i went outside, the effects of the aurora borealis were very weak. around 2am i and my girlfriend were outside viewing a much better sight of the aurora borealis. at this time it was about -20 degrees celcius, so quite chilly but we were enjoying the amazing effects of the northern lights. then at 2:15am as i was looking ne, i observed a very fast moving bright light descending from east to west. at first i believed it to be a meteor and as i was just about to say to my girlfriend "look at this shooting star" the object suddenly reduced speed extremly fast until it was stationary to the ne of us. i immediately got an extremly wierd feeling, almost like a terrifing feeling where the hairs on your arms and neck stand up. so i then get my girlfriends attention by saying "look at this light". it was a very bright orange\red orb and it was just sitting there not moving as we were both observing it. after roughly 1 minute the object then all of a sudden went vertical at an extreme rate of speed then immediately descended very quickly then began darting back and forth extremely fast. we both couldnt believe what we were witnessing, this object was manouvering around extremely fast and performing manouvers that i believe no known aircraft can do. after a few minutes the object which was in clear sight, just vanished. we were kinda shooken up but kept looking in that direction to see if the object would return. after approximately 2 minutes the object just appeared but this time it was accompanied by another similar object. so now we were observing 2 of them performing the same outstanding manouvers. although this time it was like they were somewhat chasing eachother around. at times one object would stay still while the other darted back and forth and up and down. they would also blink on and off randomly. then after observing them for roughly 3 minutes they both at the exact same time, just vanished. now at this time i was getting fairly cold from the cold temperatures but me or my girlfriend would not go inside because we were now hoping the objects would return. so again after a few minutes the objects appeared but now there were 4 of them. i couldnt belive what i was seeing but i was now very excited to watch these objects fly around the sky. all of them moving extremely fast all over the sky. i was seriously shocked to see them move extremely fast then all of a sudden completely stop without slowing down, hovering or changing directions just suddenly. again they would blink on and off sometimes only one and other times it would be 2-3 of them blinking but while moving very fast. after a few minutes, all of them at the exact same time just vanished. so again we waited hoping for them to return. and agian after a few minutes, they all at the same time appeared altough this time there was 6 of them. now my girlfriend and i really couldnt believe it. i said to her " those are definitely not airplanes or even military aircraft. those must be ufo's". so we watched them again for several minutes untill they all vanished. they returned and vanished a few more times until around 2:45am when they all dissapeared and didnt return. before this sighting i was a bit of a sceptic. i've heard stories of people seeing strange lights and even objects but i never really believed them, that's until i had my own encounter. now i am a 100% believer in other life in the universe. to this day there is no reasonable explanation to what those fascinating lights were.
content.flightPath: Hovering then path,Path with directional change,Path then hovering,Other
content.summary: My girlfriend and i observed 6 very bright orbs darting around the sky erratically for approximately 30 minutes.

content.detailedDescription:
At 2118edt, about 8 degrees s of scorpio observed 2 bright lights, #1 slowly northward, #2 slowly ne. as #1 approached head of scorpio, #2 slowly changed direction for ne to n, matching same course as #1. bright light attributed to reflective sunlight as two objects approached head star of scorpio, the brightness dimmed until lost visibility due to local area light.
note: observed similar activity about 10days ago about 10degrees above horizon moving in approximate se direction in trail formation about 3am edt, in location due n of polaris.
activity:
#1 smoking cigarette, drinking coffee.
#2 unusual movement of two "stars" at same time.
#3 first thought was satellites, then observed directional change of #2 object.
#4 as above narrative
#5 mainly curiousity, maintain visual observation as long as possible,
   then report to this organization my observations.
#6 as above narrative.
note: this is my second report to mufon in the last 20 years.
content.summary: #1 n direction, #2 ne direction, altered path to pursue #1 north

content.detailedDescription: I was driving home from work, down concord ave, around the trader joe's area.  it is overcast, but light out still.  i often look up, and saw a bunch of black dots.  my first thought was birds, except there was a larger weird looking object with them, and they moved too slow to be birds, and weren't shaped right, and didn't travel like birds.  i pulled over into a gas station parking lot, and got out of the car and grabbed my phone/camera.  the larger object was shaped like a wobbly jelly roll, and all the rest of the objects were much smaller dots/circles.  i first noticed the larger object tumble around in no noticeable direction, but it was not stationary.  then i noticed small black dots around it, then more and more.  two dots stayed ahead of the object, and the rest, about 15 of them or so, moved around, non-linear, but not stationary.  they moved around each other.  they were below and to the left of the larger object.  after a minute, the small dots below the object faded.  not suddenly, but quickly.  the larger object with the two dots in front of it stayed, moving off together.  it was still moving off when i returned to my car and left.  i did take a picture and a video, but not more because it was hard seeing the objects on my phone.  one other lady saw me looking and stopped to ask me what i was looking at.  she saw the larger object and wondered what it could be, but by that time the black dots were all gone.
content.summary: A black globular type object was tumbling high up, under cloud cover.  it was accompanied by approximately 15 small black dots, that moved in non-linear manner.  most of the dots disappeared, leaving the globule and 2 dots in the sky.

content.detailedDescription:
The night of super/blood moon/eclipse event september 27, 2015, i observed the night sky with binoculars, but did not see the blue ball. photographing with a phone camera showed the blue ball near the larger orange circle and an asymmetrical white moon. 

i took several photos. the blue ball seemed to have moved. 
 
at 0230 september 28, 2105, i returned to the same area to capture more photos. the blue ball appeared in a different sky area.

is the blue ball a planet? 

what is the orange circle?

i want to understand the orange circle and blue ball in context with the super/blood moon event.

i have had multiple ufo experiences, seen "alien" entities and been abducted a few times over 30 years, so i am calm about these contacts, but seek knowledge to know more.
content.summary: Blue ball in super/blood moon eclipse event; is it a planet?
